1528170453_1rFttYwcvZTeYwTHDHC5iy5PsfwHh.body: There must be also set ControlPort which is 9051 by default

Also I had to set owner for /opt/zeronet and /etc/zeronet.conf in order to start zeronet as a systemd service like this:
#chown -R zeronet:zeronet /opt/zeronet
#chown zeronet:zeronet /etc/zeronet.conf

If you still have trouble with it you can authenticate to a tor with a password
To do so you should run
#tor --hash-password <your super secret password>
to recieve hash
then in /etc/torrc you can set
#HashedControlPassword <your_hash>
and then set password in your /etc/zeronet.conf like this
#tor_password = <your super secret password>
then restart tor and then restart zeronet.
